casebody.data:
JACKSON
v.
JACKSON. No. 172A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 5, 2005. Nancy C. Grace, for Fred H. Jackson, Jr.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th day of May 2005 by Plaintiff for Brief to be Deemed Timely Filed:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of May 2005."
